user_bio:
I promote AI adoption and DX in Japan using n8n!

☆ Automating daily operations ☆
I support a wide range of automations, including Google Sheets integrations and notification workflows.

☆ Recommended for people like this ☆
• You spend too much time on repetitive tasks
• Your operations rely heavily on individual staff

If any of this applies to you, feel free to reach out.
I handle everything from proposal to implementation in one streamlined process.
